name: Bulldozer XT500
description: Heavy-duty bulldozer with advanced terrain adaptability. Features include enhanced durability, a powerful diesel engine for maximum efficiency, and a high-capacity blade for large-scale earthmoving tasks. Ideal for construction and mining operations.

name: Tractor ProMax 2000
description: Versatile tractor designed for high-performance agricultural tasks. Equipped with a turbocharged engine, ergonomic controls, and adaptable attachments for plowing, seeding, and harvesting. Efficient fuel consumption meets power needs for modern farming.

name: Excavator Series X2
description: Advanced excavator with precision control and high-efficiency hydraulic system. Ideal for complex digging operations and construction sites.

name: Loader LX900
description: High capacity wheel loader designed for heavy lifting and material transport in mining and quarry operations. Features robust construction for durability in tough conditions.

name: Backhoe FlexDig 770
description: Versatile backhoe loader with advanced maneuverability and digging capabilities. Equipped for a variety of tasks from excavation to material handling.

name: Dump Truck DT45
description: Heavy-duty dump truck with maximum payload capacity. Designed for efficient material transport in mining and large-scale construction projects.

name: Forklift PowerLift 3000
description: Compact forklift with exceptional lift capacity and maneuverability for warehouse operations and material handling. Features eco-friendly engine options.
